code: @Override public void afterConnectionEstablished(WebSocketSession session) throws Exception {     TextMessage message = new TextMessage(this.greetingService.getGreeting()).     session.sendMessage(message). }

@Override public void handleTextMessage(WebSocketSession session, TextMessage message) throws Exception {     this.logger.info("Received: " + message + " (" + this.latch.getCount() + ")").     session.close().     this.messagePayload.set(message.getPayload()).     this.latch.countDown(). }
